question: What are the top 3 movies with the highest budget that also have revenue data?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.budget IS NOT NULL AND m.revenue IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.budget, m.revenue
ORDER BY m.budget DESC
LIMIT 3
typeql: match $m isa movie, has title $t, has budget $b, has revenue $r; sort $b desc; limit 3; fetch { "title": $t, "budget": $b, "revenue": $r };

question: Which movies have been rated 5.0 by more than 10 users?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WHERE r.rating = 5.0
WITH m, count(u) AS numUsers
WHERE numUsers > 10
RETURN m.title, numUsers
ORDER BY numUsers DESC
LIMIT 5
typeql: match $m isa movie, has title $t; $r isa rated, links (user: $u, film: $m), has rating 5.0; reduce $count = count($u) groupby $t; sort $count desc; limit 5;

question: List all movies where the main actor is also the director.
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(p)
RETURN m.title, p.name
LIMIT 5
typeql: match $p isa person, has name $n; acted_in (actor: $p, film: $m); directed (director: $p, film: $m); $m has title $t; limit 5; fetch { "title": $t, "person": $n };

question: Find all movies with a poster URL that includes 'face'.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.poster CONTAINS 'face'
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 5
typeql: match $m isa movie, has title $t, has poster $p; $p contains "face"; limit 5; fetch { "title": $t };
